links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''Wanwavoisi''' is a name for both '''[[Varda]]''' and '''[[Manwë]]''' together, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. 

It is a [[Qenya]] name, but its etymology is unclear, although it probably contains the element ''wanwa'' ("great gale").<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, entry "[[Súlimo]]"</ref>
